column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Some of the best Chicago Style pizza you will find. Generous ration and even distribution of toppings makes a big difference in pizza
column3: and Giordano's does it right. The atmosphere is nice and has an authentic pizzeria feel right as you enter. The only real downfalls are that the pizza takes a long time to make (not their fault)
column4: and one time when I went there
column5: one of my pizzas came out at about room temperature. It probably was ready before the other pizza and had to sit and wait. I would rather they brought it out when it was hot
column6: even if not all at once.
